title: Such Impact Assessment shall also contain measures to be undertaken to mitigate its likely impact and the Action Plan for implementation of such measures in a time bound manner
clause_text: Such Impact Assessment shall also contain measures to be undertaken to mitigate its likely impact and the Action Plan for implementation of such measures in a time bound manner. It shall also contain Integrated Mobility Plan envisaging therein inter-linkages between different modes of mass transport, parking management, traffic management and pedestrianisation.
section: Impact Assessment and Integrated Mobility Plan

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
